student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Discussing hobbies with 'enjoy + ing', using, for example, 'I enjoy eating, I enjoy doing, I enjoy going…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I enjoy reading books. What do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I enjoy playing soccer. What do you enjoy doing?
Hello! I enjoy playing soccer too! I also enjoy listening to music. What kind of music do you enjoy listening to?
I enjoy listen to pop music. Do you enjoy dancing?
Yes, I enjoy dancing! When I go to parties, I enjoy dancing with friends. Do you enjoy dancing at parties?

Yes, I enjoy watching movies too! I especially enjoy watching comedies. What kind of movies do you enjoy watching? It was great talking about hobbies with you!
I enjoy watching action movies. It was great talking about hobbies with you too!
